item.title: Mentioned by Iranian
item.description:
Canada citizenship backlogs for Iranians-RQ-Farahani-rahehal
Massi Faranai , Dir of association of North American Ethnic Journalists and writers is guest of Saeed Soltanour host of 122 the rahehal ( solotuion ) on Sun Sep 1 -2013 talking on the meeting with Joe Daniel , MP , Don Valley E. , on some years of waiting time.

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
REMINDER/Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support Innovative ...
NORTH YORK, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - April 5, 2013) - Joe Daniel, Member of Parliament for Don Valley East, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will announce funding to support innovation. MP Daniel will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event. Please note that all details are subject to change. All times are local.

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support Innovative Medical Technology
Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support Innovative Medical Technology. NORTH YORK, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - April 4, 2013) - Joe Daniel, Member of Parliament for Don Valley East, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will announce funding to support innovation. MP Daniel will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event.

item.title: Mentioned by Western Producer (subscription)
item.description:
Hearings start on rail service bill
Railways could take them to court for damages. It led Toronto MP Joe Daniel to suggest the bill is one-sided. “The way the bill is actually put forward, it almost seems to be favouring the shippers rather than trying to come up with an equitable solution,” he said.
